title: [PC] Ellen.Whitakers.Horse.Life-
description:
[PC] Ellen.Whitakers.Horse.Life Date.........: 2009-03-22 Files........: 1 DVD Company......: Deep Silver Language.....: Multi 5 Requirements.: Computer, Windows 98/2K/ME/XP/Vista / : g ::::::/::' Game Notes Choose your horse, take care, feed and train him to participate in jump, dressage and cross competitions. Discover a story that will take you all around the world in your quest to become a great champion Or simply enjoy an immersive relationship with your own unique horse Features - Easy, fun and intuitive gameplay - reproduce the same moves as in real life with your mouse and keyboard - 7 breeds to choose from with a choice of accessories for your horse and its rider - All the competitions of the horse riding world represented in the game dressage, cross and jumping - Multiplayer split-screen mode - combine your forces to overcome challenges and bonus activities - Real-time horse behaviour - you will have to take care, feed and nurture your horse This game is also known as (language - Ellen Whitaker's Horse Life (English - Horse Life: Freunde fuer immer (German - Horse Life 2: Amigos para siempre (Spanish - Horse Life 2: Aventures autour du mone (French - Horse Life 2: Avventure intorno al mondo (Italian NOTE: The language the game uses depends on your operation system settings If you change in 'Control Panel' - 'Regional and Language Options the language at 'Standards and formats' then you can change the game language. It will run in english when your operation system doesn't use german, spanish, french or italian settings, else it will run in the localized language. So if it is not running in english then for example change settings to 'English (United Kingdom URL: http://horselife.deepsilver.com URL: http://www.amazon.de/dp/B001EOOK34
[PC] Ellen.Whitakers.Horse.Life
